dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HJ 117 IH: Providing for the appointment of Michael Lynton as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sam Johnson of Texas (for himself, Mr. Cole, and Mr. Becerra) introduced the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Providing for the appointment of Michael Lynton as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

section.text: That, in accordance with section 5581 of the Revised Statutes of the United States ( 20 U.S.C. 43 ), the vacancy on the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution, in the class other than Members of Congress, occurring by reason of the resignation of France A. CÃ³rdova of Indiana on March 13, 2014 is filled by the appointment of Michael M. Lynton of California. The appointment is for a term of 6 years, beginning on the date of the enactment of this joint resolution.
